name: Dangerous
description: Rashmi, an aspiring model, rents an apartment and meets married neighbor Nalini. They fall in love and plot to steal from Nalini's gangster husband. Will the risky con work?

review.author: best-review
review.heading: BAD
review.reviewBody:
The story and screenplay of this film are disappointing, as they fail to captivate and engage the audience. The direction also falls short, lacking the necessary finesse and skill.

However, the film does have redeeming qualities in terms of its cinematography and production design. These aspects are well executed and visually appealing.

In terms of acting, Naina Ganguly delivers an okay performance, showing some potential. On the other hand, Apsara's lack of acting skills is evident and detracts from the overall quality.

Considering the overall weaknesses, I would strongly advise against watching this movie, as it is unlikely to provide a satisfying experience.
